# ts-type-level-nn

A neural network sample (actually a Multilayer Perceptron, MLP) written in pure type-level TypeScript, just for fun!

See `src/main.ts` for the implementation.

You can [have a try on TS Playground](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play/?#-dFwB0PVQPts4k4nBs4KDfk4UAB3AA8DRWEw6hGGo3GaxSi2WzWRWN2+0Ox1OMBQAD5rgNSXkAPoFKAoHDAawwABCKGE0BQPXBkPpjOZMDhoMIAG0egBdClwW5waioFmMuAfUV-SVA2VwOAAPQA-MC0NSYHSGUyWezOQyAEy8py-flmoUiuCiq1SvQyu7ymyknDK1W-N0au5avUGhAdY0OwUWrkAZlt9tNguFTjFcfdnrlNB9SpVfwzwa1Ov14ceGiOjNB4JQOcVOBp6XSVquBhud3u2jQDOUzHgiRQKjgvEHpKgdmEY4QUArRMS4aNJoFLKwk5QUB53T5yZZcPLlZwzvFmdl3vr-rVEqLof1VMjS8dq7HNq3duju-36SraZdbulp7rX0L0DK922LMM71pd8YCfdcE1fJNlyFT9v3TE8vUAvMA0LMCbzbVQACoiOIkiiIMOACIeGcjiORIKPI0jGII1Rw2hKgWicTcITtT9UzFSUxUvCkF3vJsuLPIUKAARwYDQmGUYVaw4npCFrBVfUbdIejJYSBjU3MGzE8F0HIuACQOWiSRQAAuXpWy1AB1FBgESbQVERZo0XadJbNFUytVFBQ-guABWAA2AAOABOHoopCqKEoAditEKrStMKJXwfyXSC--qtbl0q4wVhX9tSltpnNuGhZFpblCltaNplgbAr+fXevC+KQv28Hpiil7fkSsLEr1npUoKi5ytziKU7jRKSpK+KRvS5PAaj4GQe66GYtK1LEud+HEdYlGnHg9HMcZzSrX4-HtfdETaSbLuKapuSFLYji4wZ9TGU0uMWfDdnF7H4zTN5yyzgF+zhcWsWJalzaI4LEH-sOlsL+S3Xnct347vjq1VaNk641+4b74JwM0ui8K069STr9ZuFsf5HWuunfWbU9YJSii3AOh9lojG8qHZop8tYXXuhnaqvtooxQznPKuvwOrdSOr9NqZUjodRTtMCKucc55zTlFTqRCLr60qp7fKLCbqtQQQjVmM9QTTETD3BeTMiF40EiBXS8xFxNhEd0CeMkp60w4tMeeBlNLTBXnpXuCjN48z2BZYku87KINFu5RonkUFjAwQ-UqY03b-1Sqlb+DUOrq0vmNTqYMIruOCsXaqL9pjFxBpFE6ATfhq1zvbG6oT---axlrrFObWVw9IIKvSLR6du5J4bI7gXbZQ6mwRRXfxrRgmDXb1MSa3d6Kg4HvRGm3KoUCqxW+r9T1H0QbuMU8NO6zSLj6b5b9LTwUrq5woU1eKL9qHGeifHe6utCqFXSk1GqgGrnIJTZkhT+L4k1Xuh9Xl-0iqlLarnGKV1obHRqRhpTpsqplQzk3Np9CQF0JacbNxlHDD9PmIMqKdHB2ifY6O2ZLG5Gk3y5xyS6z1U9srouqKwmGviaNZJndFyZPmpsfJ8D2typ+d5bFZDnV1ZPv2lde9STKrG3dj66qPUIl7SRenFJLt-i8uiunHWVmqqpXjakvd6SsVed64R2tf0YE3XyvBil4Vda4easNE66HtrFyqU0-TvtxpbMI6lflhUTrJW+qAhNOXkY9q6gVhrjHB6EzKws0mkOquzp4xDi4mqOZaQuE1nZSON2Gq3W101h2uu3J6w8vF-x7vyxtk0n9AGYW5WfQVD+pmypJ3ajZxxNderdPatVGzOsIn8uqpDb6uG3NJpA2HCnAULrRX0-+4aoVhq-QQ1nOhLaDo2zoeW7aKL6mEKzjdF7fxlY-Jth1f6pCKpdoGR3HWUPcfo+mbD-48OSajy0uJVZ3HavKQBounWOOBPe5a4Tk45z97ufFjcy1suf6QJuhnLqdDurKzm99L2TTM7JU7WG6Jd19b7WakXZt8CC-p8qlnKq+1L1HUl8B47oGcUJ-TW1SzCUeoq-CtFBDytlZNRKo6w6B0U6G6ajbCFJ1OmlNF1bzhOaPqhtB9R5SaNIRiKKzrGH0i5WsZ
